snippet.name: Java Bean 생성 코드조각
snippet.code: SELECT 'private '|| DECODE( DATA_TYPE , 'NUMBER', 'Integer ', 'String ') || LOWER(SUBSTR(COLUMN_NAME, 1, 1)) || SUBSTR( REPLACE( INITCAP(COLUMN_NAME) , '_', ''), 2) || ';' FROM COLS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'MEMBER';

snippet.name: COMMENT 생성 코드조각
상세조회 table UI 코드조각
snippet.code: -- -- 회원아이디 -- ${member.memId } -- SELECT '' || COMMENTS ||'' || '${' || LOWER(TABLE_NAME) || '.' || SNAKETOCAMEL(COLUMN_NAME) || '}' FROM USER_COL_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'MEMBER';

snippet.name: 입력양식 UI 생성 코드조각
snippet.code: -- -- 회원아이디 -- -- -- -- --varchar2, char, date, number SELECT '' || COMMENTS || '' || '' || '' FROM COLS A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON(A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME) WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = 'MEMBER';

snippet.name: 인라인 파라미터 생성 코드조각
snippet.code: --#{memId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} SELECT ', #{' || SNAKETOCAMEL(COLUMN_NAME) ||',jdbcType=' || CASE WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'VARCHAR2' THEN 'VARCHAR' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'NUMBER' THEN 'NUMERIC' ELSE DATA_TYPE END || '}' FROM COLS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'MEMBER';

snippet.name: 입력 양식 UI 생성 코드조각
snippet.code: -- -- 회원아이디 -- -- -- ${errors.memId } -- -- SELECT '' || COMMENTS || '' || '' || '${errors.' || SNAKETOCAMEL(A.COLUMN_NAME) || '}' FROM COLS A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON (A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME) WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = 'MEMBER';
